Uses of Class
net.paulhertz.aifile.RGBColor

Packages that use RGBColor
Package Description
net.paulhertz.aifile
Package net.paulhertz.aifile provides dual functionality as a display list utility in Processing and as an export tool that writes to an Adobe Illustrator 7.0 file.

  • Uses of RGBColor in net.paulhertz.aifile

    static RGBColor RGBColor.cmyk2rgb​(double[] cmyk)
    Uses the standard quick and dirty direct transform of CMYK to RGB.

    Uses the standard quick and dirty direct transform of CMYK to RGB.
    static RGBColor RGBColor.cmyk2rgb​(CMYKColor cmyk)
    Uses the standard quick and dirty direct transform of CMYK to RGB.
    static RGBColor Palette.int2rgb​(int argb)
    Converts a Processing color to an RGBColor.
    Methods in net.paulhertz.aifile with parameters of type RGBColor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Palette.addColor​(RGBColor rgb)
    Transforms an RGBColor to a 32-bit int and adds it to the colorSet of this Palette.
